title: Constraints
description: A guide in my new Starlight docs site.
---


## Storage Constraints

| Storage Structure   | Key Length   | Value Length  | Unique Key Requirement | Additional Details  |
|-------------------|--------------------------------------|--------------------|-------------------|--------------------------|
| Local State Storage | Up to 64 bytes   | Key + value ≤ 128 bytes | Yes  | Larger datasets require partitioning        |
| Box Storage         |   1 to 64 bytes    | Up to 32KB (32,768 bytes)    | Yes       | Key does not contribute to box size and values > 1,024 bytes need additional references |
|Global State Storage | Up to 64 bytes   |  Key + value ≤ 128 bytes   | Yes | Larger datasets require partitioning      |
